name: bloglist
description: Blog list app exercise for part 4 of Fullstackopen

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../../2/luento/notes && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../3/luento/notes-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Angel Rodriguez
